import { oneOf as O } from "prop-types";
import { styled as N, css as T } from "@twilio-paste/styling-library";
import { Box as w } from "@twilio-paste/box";
var i = N(w)(({
  _activeSibling: l,
  _boxChild: o,
  _checkedAndActiveSibling: n,
  _checkedAndDisabledSibling: c,
  _checkedAndFocusSibling: d,
  _checkedAndHoverSibling: t,
  _checkedAndInvalidSibling: a,
  _checkedAndInvalidAndHoverSibling: s,
  _checkedSibling: r,
  _checkedSiblingAndBoxChild: p,
  _disabledSibling: b,
  _focusSibling: h,
  _hoverSibling: x,
  _invalidSibling: u,
  _invalidAndHoverSibling: S,
  type: e = "checkbox"
}) => {
  let k = `input[type=${e}]:active + label &`,
      v = `input[type=${e}]:checked + label &, input[type=${e}][aria-checked=mixed] + label &`,
      y = `input[type=${e}]:checked:active + label &, input[type=${e}][aria-checked=mixed]:active + label &`,
      B = `input[type=${e}]:checked + label & > *, input[type=${e}][aria-checked=mixed] + label & > *`,
      P = `input[type=${e}]:checked:disabled + label &, input[type=${e}][aria-checked=mixed]:disabled + label &`,
      g = `input[type=${e}]:checked:focus + label &, input[type=${e}][aria-checked=mixed]:focus + label &`,
      $ = `input[type=${e}]:checked:hover:not(:disabled) + label &, input[type=${e}][aria-checked=mixed]:hover:not(:disabled) + label &`,
      A = `input[type=${e}][aria-invalid=true]:checked + label &`,
      m = `input[type=${e}][aria-invalid=true]:checked:hover:not(:disabled) + label &`,
      _ = `input[type=${e}] + label & > *`,
      f = `input[type=${e}]:disabled + label &`,
      H = `input[type=${e}]:focus + label &`,
      I = `input[type=${e}]:hover:not(:disabled):not(:checked) + label &`,
      C = `input[type=${e}][aria-invalid=true] + label &`,
      D = `input[type=${e}][aria-invalid=true]:hover:not(:disabled) + label &`;
  return T({
    [k]: l,
    [v]: r,
    [y]: n,
    [B]: p,
    [P]: c,
    [g]: d,
    [$]: t,
    [A]: a,
    [m]: s,
    [_]: o,
    [f]: b,
    [H]: h,
    [I]: x,
    [C]: u,
    [D]: S
  });
});
i.displayName = "SiblingBox";
i.defaultProps = {
  alignItems: "center",
  "aria-hidden": "true",
  display: "inline-flex",
  flexShrink: 0,
  justifyContent: "center",
  transition: "all 120ms"
};
export { i as SiblingBox };

sourcesContent: import{oneOf as O}from"prop-types";import{styled as N,css as T}from"@twilio-paste/styling-library";import{Box as w}from"@twilio-paste/box";var i=N(w)(({_activeSibling:l,_boxChild:o,_checkedAndActiveSibling:n,_checkedAndDisabledSibling:c,_checkedAndFocusSibling:d,_checkedAndHoverSibling:t,_checkedAndInvalidSibling:a,_checkedAndInvalidAndHoverSibling:s,_checkedSibling:r,_checkedSiblingAndBoxChild:p,_disabledSibling:b,_focusSibling:h,_hoverSibling:x,_invalidSibling:u,_invalidAndHoverSibling:S,type:e="checkbox"})=>{let k=`input[type=${e}]:active + label &`,v=`input[type=${e}]:checked + label &, input[type=${e}][aria-checked=mixed] + label &`,y=`input[type=${e}]:checked:active + label &, input[type=${e}][aria-checked=mixed]:active + label &`,B=`input[type=${e}]:checked + label & > *, input[type=${e}][aria-checked=mixed] + label & > *`,P=`input[type=${e}]:checked:disabled + label &, input[type=${e}][aria-checked=mixed]:disabled + label &`,g=`input[type=${e}]:checked:focus + label &, input[type=${e}][aria-checked=mixed]:focus + label &`,$=`input[type=${e}]:checked:hover:not(:disabled) + label &, input[type=${e}][aria-checked=mixed]:hover:not(:disabled) + label &`,A=`input[type=${e}][aria-invalid=true]:checked + label &`,m=`input[type=${e}][aria-invalid=true]:checked:hover:not(:disabled) + label &`,_=`input[type=${e}] + label & > *`,f=`input[type=${e}]:disabled + label &`,H=`input[type=${e}]:focus + label &`,I=`input[type=${e}]:hover:not(:disabled):not(:checked) + label &`,C=`input[type=${e}][aria-invalid=true] + label &`,D=`input[type=${e}][aria-invalid=true]:hover:not(:disabled) + label &`;return T({[k]:l,[v]:r,[y]:n,[B]:p,[P]:c,[g]:d,[$]:t,[A]:a,[m]:s,[_]:o,[f]:b,[H]:h,[I]:x,[C]:u,[D]:S})});i.displayName="SiblingBox";i.defaultProps={alignItems:"center","aria-hidden":"true",display:"inline-flex",flexShrink:0,justifyContent:"center",transition:"all 120ms"};export{i as SiblingBox};
